item.title: Workshops
item.description: Magic of the Springs - Kathy Grant October 15 & 16, 2011 Time: Sunday 9am - 4pm Cost: $175 PMA Approved - 6 CEC In this workshop we will explore a forgotten aspect of Pilates – the proper use of springs. We will discover how a true relationship with the springs will bring about core strength and freedom from extraneous tension. Too often we struggle against the equipment, the challenge of the exercise and our own habitual patterns.
